div.div:
✓ Independent deployment
✓ Technology diversity
✓ Independent scaling
✓ Fault isolation
✓ Team autonomy
✓ Database per service
✗ Distributed complexity
✗ Network latency
✗ Data consistency
✗ Operational overhead
✗ Testing complexity

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(213, 232, 212), rgb(31, 47, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));

div.div:
• Large, complex applications
• Multiple development teams
• Need independent scaling
• Polyglot persistence
• Continuous delivery
• Cloud-native applications

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
